title: Accurate transition state generation with an object-aware equivariant elementary reaction diffusion model. (arXiv:2304.06174v1 [physics.chem-ph])
abstract: Transition state (TS) search is key in chemistry for elucidating reaction mechanisms and exploring reaction networks. The search for accurate 3D TS structures, however, requires numerous computationally intensive quantum chemistry calculations due to the complexity of potential energy surfaces. Here, we developed an object-aware SE(3) equivariant diffusion model that satisfies all physical symmetries and constraints for generating pairs of structures, i.e., reactant, TS, and product, in an elementary reaction. Provided reactant and product, this model generates a TS structure in seconds instead of the hours required when performing quantum chemistry-based optimizations. The generated TS structures achieve an average error of 0.13 A root mean square deviation compared to true TS. translated_title: 一种具有物体感知等变基元反应扩散模型的精确过渡态生成方法
translated_abstract: 过渡态搜索在化学中具有重要作用，可用于阐明反应机理和探索反应网络。但搜索精确的三维过渡态结构需要大量的量子化学计算，因为势能面的复杂性。本文开发了一种物体感知 SE(3) 等变扩散模型，满足生成反应物、过渡态和生成物三种结构的所有物理对称性和约束条件。在已知反应物和生成物的情况下，该模型可以在几秒钟内生成过渡态结构，而不需要进行基于量子化学的优化，从而大大缩短了计算时间。生成的过渡态结构与真实结构的平均误差为 0.13 A 根均方差。通过对不确定性进行评估，并进行置信度评分，可以实现反应速率估计所需的精度 (2.6 kcal/mol)，并且只需对 14% 的结果进行基于量子化学的优化。
tldr: 本文开发了一种物体感知 SE(3) 等变扩散模型，可以在几秒钟内精确地生成过渡态结构，与基于量子化学的优化相比，计算时间大大缩短，其生成的过渡态结构与真实结构的平均误差为 0.13 A 根均方差，可以实现反应速率估计所需的精度。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes an object-aware SE(3) equivariant diffusion model that can accurately generate transition state structures in seconds, significantly reducing computational time compared to quantum chemistry-based optimization. The generated structures have an average error of 0.13 A root mean square deviation compared to true TS, and achieve the required accuracy for reaction rate estimation (2.6 kcal/mol) by only optimizing 14% of the results based on quantum chemistry.
